item.title: Learning R Part 5
item.description: Learning R Part 5 Part 5, modifying values in R. I’m betting this is going to be a contiuation of the same. It seems we’re just going to combine setting values and indexing. > vec <- c(0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0) > vec [1] 0 0 0 0 0 0 > vec[1] [1] 0 > vec[1] <- 1000 > vec [1] 1000 0 0 0 0 0 > vec[c(1, 3, 5)] <- c(1, 1, 1) > vec [1] 1 0 1 0 1 0 > vec[4:6] <- vec[4:6] + 1 > vec [1] 1 0 1 1 2 1 > deck <- read.
